sqlMap.select: select * from subject group by sub_parent_code

select sub_no as subNo ,sub_parent_code as subParentCode ,sub_parent_name as subParentName ,sub_code as subCode ,sub_name as subName ,sub_descript as subDescript from subject where sub_parent_code = #subParentCode#
select ifnull(max(quiz_group)+1,1) from quiz where study_no = #studyNo#

select A.*, sub_parent_name, sub_name, 0 as zzim from (select quiz.*,member.mem_name from quiz inner join member on member.mem_id=quiz.mem_id where quiz.study_no = #studyNo# group by quiz.quiz_group) A, subject where subject.sub_no = A.sub_no order by quiz_group desc

select d.*, e.sub_parent_name, e.sub_name, f.mem_name, ifnull(c.zzim, 0) as zzim from (select b.quiz_id, 1 as zzim from quiz a inner join my_quiz b on a.quiz_id = b.quiz_id where b.mem_id = #memId#) c right join quiz d on c.quiz_id = d.quiz_id inner join subject e on e.sub_no = d.sub_no inner join member f on f.mem_id = d.mem_id where d.study_no = #studyNo# and d.quiz_group = #quizGroup#
#quizSubCode[]#
order by d.quiz_no
sqlMap.update: update quiz set quiz_viewcnt = quiz_viewcnt+1 where quiz_group = #quizGroup#

update quiz set quiz_title = #quizTitle# ,quiz_prob = #quizProb# ,quiz_answer = #quizAnswer# ,sub_no = #subNo# ,quiz_regdate = now() ,quiz_tag = #quizTag# where quiz_group = #quizGroup# and quiz_no = #quizNo#
sqlMap.delete: delete from quiz where quiz_group = #quizGroup# and study_no = #studyNo#
delete from my_quiz where mem_id = #memId# and quiz_id = #quizId#
sqlMap.select:
select * from quiz
where quiz_prob like CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
where mem_id like CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
where quiz_answer like CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')
where quiz_tag like CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%')

select d.*, e.sub_parent_name, e.sub_name, f.mem_name, ifnull(c.zzim, 0) as zzim from (select b.quiz_id, 1 as zzim from quiz a inner join my_quiz b on a.quiz_id = b.quiz_id where b.mem_id = #memId#) c right join quiz d on c.quiz_id = d.quiz_id inner join subject e on e.sub_no = d.sub_no inner join member f on f.mem_id = d.mem_id where d.quiz_id = #quizId#

select a.*,b.sub_parent_name,b.sub_name,c.mem_name from ( select quiz.* from quiz inner join my_quiz on quiz.quiz_id = my_quiz.quiz_id where my_quiz.mem_id = #memId# ) a inner join subject b on a.sub_no = b.sub_no inner join member c on c.mem_id = a.mem_id
